channel.title: Golang on Uncle Xiang's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Uncle Xiang's Notebook

item.title: Why learn a new language?
item.description:
Why learn other programming languages after more than ten years of experience with [this/it]?

Lack of experience in elegant module design, grammar is flexible, and learning other languages can guide the creation of more elegant designs

I often find myself using these tools when writing code

Whether it’s the underlying library design or the business module implementation, the design principles are consistent
